name: axios
text:
Authorities ordered Hong Kong Disneyland to close after the city reported 38 new infections on Friday.

Comparatively, Orlando's Walt Disney World reopened Saturday even as the state reported over 15,000 new cases in a single day over the weekend.
https://t.co/RMD4XGPMza

name: axios
text:
Former White House chief of staff Mick Mulvaney in a CNBC op-ed: "I know it isnâ€™t popular to talk about in some Republican circles, but we still have a testing problem in this country." 
https://t.co/PbY1tjlOS3

name: axios
text:
Andrew Cuomo said New York schools will only reopen if data shows the coronavirus is under control in their region, including a daily infection rate of below 5% over a 14-day average.

"We're not going to use our children as guinea pigs."
https://t.co/9ZlUWHrhes

name: axios
text:
Los Angeles and San Diego are the first big districts to announce public schools will start out online-only in the fall.

This could start a domino effect among officials who haven't made a final decision.
https://t.co/FOVEvHVjTd
